remarks: Modular law for hyperplanes analogous to complement of ~ atmod2i1 for atoms.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Jun-2013.)
statement:
lhpmod.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lhpmod.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lhpmod.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
lhpmod.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
lhpmod.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhpmod6i1 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ X .<_ W ) -> ( X .\/ ( Y ./\ W ) ) = ( ( X .\/ Y ) ./\ W ) ) $.
